name: Saeculum Maze
description:
"The Underworld has suffered an overload due a pandemic in the human world! Assist your Mortuary Department and FIND all the LOST souls, before the entire Purgatory collapses!"

This game was made for the Global Game Jam 2021

Coding: Romina Julieta Barbosa & "Chess" / Game Design: Sebastián Cova / Art Design: Juan Nicolás Cerone / Level Design: Rodrigo Joaquín Bargiela / Conceptual: Marcos González Cutre
